content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ have you ever wondered what happens with a shawl when you change yarn weights this shawl can now be created with fingering weight or dk weight yarn you choose > this is a great beginner-friendly > crochet project with a video tutorial i firmly believe in supporting and uplifting other makers and creators recently some local dyers did the same for each other and organized a really fun event called the yarn lounge 1 here in central florida it was the perfect time for me to purchase some new squishy yarn and work with the local market but the cool thing is you don t have to be in central florida to enjoy these stunning yarn options head on over to olive and two ewe studios 2 to view the yarn used in this pattern as well as lots of other beautiful choices or use up some pretty yarn in your stash that has been sitting around waiting for the perfect project i ve also included a few substitute suggestions in the pattern as well **video tutorial** https //youtu be/evia54ln3s8 3 **pattern pack discounts** use code save10 for 10% off $10 save15 for 15% off $15 save20 for 20% off $20 more cannot be combined with other offers **crochet hook ** size g 4mm hook for fingering weight size i 5 5mm hook for dk weight 4 use code brianak for 15% off at furls crochet **notions ** removable stitch marker yarn needle to weave in ends scissors 5 **yarn & yardage ** olive and two ewe 6 color a celebration twain color b silver linings poe fingering weight approx 860 yards or yarnalia wonder 7 30% wool 70% acrylic 123yds/50g dk weight approx 1190 yards colors golden dust & snow **abbreviations/stitches ** chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet decrease - double_crochet two sts together slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es stsc - stacked single_crochet **gauge ** fingering weight 18 double_crochet sts and 9 row = 4 dk weight 13 double_crochet sts and 7 row = 4 **measurements/sizes ** it is recommended to block aggressively to measurements for the filet hexagons to really show fingering weight shawl 76 1⁄2 194 cm by 16 41 cm dk weight shawl 88 203 cm by 23 59 cm **skill level ** easy/ beginner this pattern can be found on the briana k designs blog let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2020 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs
